title: Watering in the Morning
content: Always water your plants in the morning to prevent fungal growth.

content: Compost tea boosts plant immunity and improves soil health.

content: Regular soil testing helps maintain optimal growing conditions.

title: Mulching Benefits
content: Mulch conserves water and suppresses weeds.
